com.kuka.roboticsAPI.applicationModel.tasks
Interface ITaskAccessor

All Known Subinterfaces:
IMultiInstanceTaskAccessor, ISingleInstanceTaskAccessor
public interface ITaskAccessor

User task representation.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getUniqueId()
          Function to retrieve the unique id of the task wrapper.
 boolean isBackgroundTask()
          Indicates whether the main class is a Robotics API background task.

          Indicates whether the main class is a Robotics API application.
 

Method Detail

isRoboticsAPIApplication

boolean isRoboticsAPIApplication()
Indicates whether the main class is a Robotics API application.

Returns:
True, if the main class is a Robotics API application; otherwise false.

isBackgroundTask

boolean isBackgroundTask()
Indicates whether the main class is a Robotics API background task.

Returns:
True, if the main class is a Robotics API background task; otherwise false.

getUniqueId

java.lang.String getUniqueId()
Function to retrieve the unique id of the task wrapper. The id is identical with the id of the TaskClass.

Returns:
The unique id.
